data.title: Barbara Robinson Obituary
data.meta_description: PEPPERELL  Barbara Ann Robinson, 75, of Pepperell, passed away on June 16, 2023 at the Life Care Center of Nashoba Valley. Barbara was born in Nashua, NH on
data.text:
Barbara Ann Robinson OBITUARY

PEPPERELL Barbara Ann Robinson, 75, of Pepperell, passed away on June 16, 2023 at the Life Care Center of Nashoba Valley. Barbara was born in Nashua, NH on May 18, 1948 to Robert E. and Jayne (Scott) Danforth. Barbara is predeceased by her parents, Robert and Jayne (Scott) Danforth, and close friend Sue Baker. Survivors include her son, Raymond “Robbie” Robinson and his wife Donna of Pepperell; daughter Sherry Green and her husband John and beloved and only grandson, Jacob, of Winchendon, MA; sister and best friend Joan Schibbelhute of Pepperell; sister Gail Mandra and her husband Mike of Milford NH; brother Robert Danforth, Jr. and his wife Jean of Shirley, MA; brother Raymond Danforth and his wife Julie of Ashburnham, MA; sister Terry Duggan and her husband Phil of Townsend, MA; a special cousin who was like a sister to her, Linda Starr, of Pepperell; and many nieces and nephews that meant so much to her. The family would like to thank the staff at Life Care Center in Littleton, MA for their patience and care while she was there as well as New England Hospice for their compassion and care of Barbara in her final days.

Visiting hours will be held in the McGaffigan Family Funeral Home, 37 Main St., (Rte. 113) Pepperell, MA on Thursday, June 22nd from 4 – 7 pm. Barbara’s Funeral Service will be held in the Funeral Home on Friday, June 23rd at 10 am. Burial will follow at Woodlawn Cemetery, Pepperell. In lieu of flowers, donations can be made in Barbara’s name to PACH Outreach, PO Box 1247, Pepperell, MA 01463. Please see www.McGaffiganFuneral.com for complete obituary.
